author: Lorraine Denman
comment: Downloaded this and it just doesn't hope and work on my huawei phone and smartwatch, waste of money, won't allow me to get a refund

author: Zener Diode
comment: I love this watch face and I love the multitude of settings as I do on all of your watches.
title: I love all of your watch faces!

author: Lucinda Carr
comment: Love the Feminine looks of these watch faces.  You can change them to match your outfit

author: Yvette Mitchell
comment: Nice design and attention to detail by a great team.  Lots of customization options you can create so many different looks.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: Thank you Yvette. It was because of your suggestions that made us make this watch!

title: A watch for the ladies!

author: Marla Braverman
comment: I like it.   Would like the option to change the text on the watch face to either custom text or blank.
title: Pretty
